message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point, but I'm open to discussing a fair deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $9,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is a significant drop from my initial price. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still aiming to keep my expenses within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9,500?
